title: Visa | Software Engineer | Bangalore
content:
Education: B.E., Computer Science & Engineering at Tier 3 College
Years of Experience: 1.4 years
Prior Experience: Product-based companies in Bangalore (₹4.5 LPA base + additional benefits)
Date of the Offer: December 2024
Company: Visa
Title/Level: SW Engineer
Location: Bangalore
Salary: ₹13,00,000
Relocation: NA
Signing Bonus: NA
Stock bonus: NA
Bonus: NA
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ₹13,00,000
Benefits: Internet Allowance + Car Allowance
Other details: Haven't done the negotiation yet.

Have another offer from Unicorn: ₹12,00,000 LPA base.
 
Should I Negotiate?
